title: GQ GMC-500+ (Plus) Geiger Counter Nuclear Radiation Detector Monitor Beta Gamma X-Ray Dosimeter
features: Enhanced model, dual geiger tubes sensor, independent calibration factors
Push the detection range upper limit 10 times higher
Large informative LCD Display with auto horizontal and vertical large font display
Built-in flash memory. Onboard speaker and audio output,Rechargeable battery installed.
With unlimited server logging data storage. Submit data to any server in the world automatically
Product online user manual guide available in English, German, French
description: Product Description New model from GQ Electronics LLC, Seattle, USA This GQ GMC-500+ Geiger counter is a portable nuclear radiation detector. It detects Beta, Gamma, X-ray radiation and can be used as continuous radiation monitor or used as a personal dosimeter to track the radiation received. Nuclear radiation is invisible but threatening to human health, environmental safety. For example, if receive 100 mSv radiation, the risk to fatal health disease increases. This meter detects and visualizes the radiation in real time, give you a peace of mind. It can record the historical data for future analysis. The thoughtful design provides easy-to-use basic features as well as advanced features for users want to explore more Key Features Stand Alone Detection Mode Only need ready-to-go main unit Carry the main unit and detect the potential radiation around you any time Can be used as personal accumulative dosimeter (user time reset able) Continuous Monitoring Mode Use with PC to continuously monitor the radiation anywhere, any time frame The main unit is designed to place, hang, hold anywhere Seattle, WA service center Online support forum community Phone & email support from Seattle Basic Features Fast reading in seconds after turn on Accurate & real-time data Display CPM,uSv/h, mR/h in one screen Real time Recording Data record first, playback later Real time clock LED Visual & Audio Alert Large Text,Text,Graphic Display Main Unit Build Small 5 x 3 x1 Light & portable Two Geiger sensors Rechargeable battery Large LCD Graphic UI Adjustable Back lit Advanced CPU on-board Build-in internal flash memory Build-in WiFi module On-board speaker & Gyroscope Versatile Data Acquisition Advance Features Independent calibration factors Bar & line graph USB data port Data logging Submit data to any server in the world automatically Open Protocol Data Viewer Software Converts Data to Universal Format PC GMC data viewer software is included free for downloading the history data. And the data can be saved as standard .CSV format file. WiFi Data Logging to server for sharing the data Open Protocol for easy integration to other application system WiFi data logging to GMCmap server with free unlimited data storage. iPhone APP provide easy access to data iPhone APP facilitated use with cellphone Specification Radiation Detection: Beta, Gamma and X-Ray . Detection Dose Range: 0 ~ 42500uSv/h Detection CPM Range: 0 ~ 982980 CPM Detectable Energy Range: 0.1~3.0 MeV Own Background: 0.2 Pulses/s Working Voltage: 3.2-4.0V LCD Display: Dot matrix with back light Working power: 0.045W - 0.2W Power: 3.6V/3.7V battery / USB power Applications This unit can be used to detect/monitor/measure low dose background environment either indoor or outdoor. Alert you once big incident happens: like dirty bomb, Fukushima, Chernobyl. Nuke plant environment radioactive plume like Fukushima Space radiation, air industrial and on airplane. Real-time testing evaluation and scientific testing on samples Fruit and imported food radiation testing The GMC-500 Plus can detect the radiation if the fruit has been radioactive contaminated. Carry the unit with you to test air, food, water and personal environment Radioiodine (I -131) Therapy The GMC-500 Plus can be used to monitor the radiation level during the treatment and keep the family member at the safe distance. It can be used to monitor if any one is under I-131 treatment around you. Use the GMC-500 Plus for Hospital Radiation Therapy Monitoring & Radio iodine Treatment Monitoring Applications This unit can be used to detect/monitor/measure low dose background environment either indoor or outdoor. Lab research, oil field, and material testing Stone collection, marble counter-top, building material and antique collection Real-time testing evaluation, scientific testing on samples Measuring on Antique radiation level like Vintage Fiesta Dinning Ware and others Nuclear Plant, Air and Environment Food and Water Hospital Treatments Rocks, Antiques and etc.
